extension_name.description: The display name for the extension.

extension_description.message:
☞ Is it possible to overcome the need of hitting 🔄 Refresh button in Azure portal pages?
☞ Yes!

🛐 I will click them every 🔟 seconds when there are no 🖱️ or ⌨️ activity on the page.
extension_description.description: Description of what the extension does.
